Name: Landmarks, South Jamaica Gateway Rezoning, Queens (C 240330 HAQ).
Title: Application number C 240330 HAQ (South Jamaica Gateway Rezoning) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located at 106-01 Guy R. Brewer Boulevard (Block 10161, Lots 1, 3, and 9), Borough of Queens, Community District 12, Council Districts 27 and 28.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
